description: Professional-grade text-to-video generation with advanced prompt optimization and high-quality output

prompt.description: The text prompt to guide video generation
prompt.placeholder: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm and a well-worn coat that hints at many dangerous escapades across the galaxy...

prompt_optimizer.description: Whether to use the model's prompt optimizer for better results

prompt_details.style_guide: Create detailed, descriptive prompts with rich character and scene descriptions for professional cinematic video generation
best_practices: Use vivid, descriptive language for characters and environments
Include specific details about appearance, clothing, and equipment
Describe the setting and atmosphere in detail
Mention character motivations and personality traits
Use cinematic terminology for professional results
Focus on narrative depth and character development

prompt_structure.character_description: Detailed description of main characters and their appearance
prompt_structure.visual_elements: Specific visual details and cinematic elements

example_prompts.title: Sci-Fi Character Pro
example_prompts.prompt: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm and a well-worn coat that hints at many dangerous escapades across the galaxy. Their ship is filled with rare and exotic treasures from distant planets, concealed in hidden compartments, showing their expertise in illicit trade. Their belt is adorned with energy-based weapons, ready to be drawn at any moment to protect themselves or escape from tight situations. This character thrives in the shadows of space, navigating between the law and chaos with stealth and wit, always seeking the next big score while evading bounty hunters and law enforcement.

example_prompts.title: Fantasy Epic Scene
example_prompts.prompt: A majestic dragon with iridescent scales soars through a mystical forest, its wings casting shadows over ancient ruins. The dragon's eyes glow with ancient wisdom as it navigates between towering trees and floating islands, creating a scene of pure fantasy and wonder. The forest itself seems alive with magical energy, with glowing mushrooms and ethereal mist swirling around the dragon's flight path.

request.prompt: A Galactic Smuggler is a rogue figure with a cybernetic arm and a well-worn coat that hints at many dangerous escapades across the galaxy. Their ship is filled with rare and exotic treasures from distant planets, concealed in hidden compartments, showing their expertise in illicit trade.

example_requests.title: Cinematic Scene
example_requests.description: Professional cinematic scene with detailed description

request.prompt: A professional chef preparing a gourmet dish in a modern kitchen, steam rising from the pan, dramatic lighting highlighting the ingredients, and the chef's focused expression showing years of culinary expertise. The kitchen is filled with the warm glow of cooking fires and the rich aromas of spices and herbs.

example_requests.title: Action Sequence
example_requests.description: Dynamic action scene with detailed character and environment

request.prompt: A skilled martial artist performs a complex kata in a traditional dojo, their movements fluid and precise. The wooden floor reflects the soft lighting, and traditional Japanese artwork adorns the walls. The artist's focus is intense, their breathing controlled as they execute each technique with perfect form.

url.description: URL where the video can be downloaded

content_type.description: MIME type of the video file

file_size.description: Size of the video file in bytes

usage_tips: Use detailed, descriptive prompts for better character and scene generation
Enable prompt optimizer for enhanced results with complex descriptions
Focus on visual details and cinematic elements in your prompts
Consider the narrative flow when describing character actions and environments
This pro version is optimized for high-quality, professional results
limitations: No duration customization (uses default optimized duration)
Complex scenes with many elements may be challenging
Processing time may be longer for high-quality output
